monster.name: Penguin

trait.name: Fat and Feathers
trait.text: Penguins have a layer of fat, as well as a coat of water-repellant feathers, to keep it warm and dry even when submerged. They can tolerate temperatures as low as -20 degrees Fahrenheit without any additional protection.

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The penguin can hold its breath for 20 minutes.

action.name: Beak
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., 1 target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

monster.description:
A penguin is a flightless bird found in frigid regions near large bodies of water. It is an excellent swimmer and can tolerate the freezing waters there as it hunts fish.
Source: SRD
